channel.title: I can't compile or run =\
channel.description:
Umm hi there.. Im really stuck here I want to start my very first server and make it amazing (great economy, own source, 100% full skills) but I can't do it.. I've set the enviromental variables and currently I have Jdk 6_u12 and im trying to use the Devolution 7 source. Also im using taharoks compiler and its saying to get JDK 5.0 or 6.0 but its not on the JAVA download page anymore so idk what to do.. Also one of my friends told me to just get a hoster but I want to have full control over my server.
Ps: I have Vista (I know it sucks)
Edit:
If you have had the same problem and some how fixed it please tell me =) I would be willing to change the compiler etc.. Also im not sure if port forwarding has anything to do with this, well it might but idk...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2009, 03:31:38 pm[/size][hr]Just edited abit..
PLEASE HELP!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2009, 03:38:34 pm[/size][hr]Just edited abit :D

item.title: I can't compile or run =\
item.dc:creator: @Fanz Fanz
item.description:
@Fanz wrote:

Thanks man finaly a compile and run that works!

Still I can’t log in so im just going to try and use another source but if not I will try to port forward again.

THANK YOU

Read full topic

item.title: I can't compile or run =\
item.dc:creator: @ultimate_k0 ultimate k0
item.description:
@ultimate_k0 wrote:

check your system variables are set, if not follow the guide on tutorial’s section, if you have set them then right click on your compiler and click edit

Then press ctrl-a to delete everything and put in this code

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Open up the runserver.bat/run.bat and replace with this

@echo off color 0a title your source java -Xmx256m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

i hope i helped,

~ultimate k0~

Read full topic
